Package me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport.netty.internal

Class Summary
SecureSMTPClientPipelineFactory ChannelPipelineFactory which is used for SMTPS connections
SecureSMTPClientPipelineFactory.SslHandshakeHandler SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler which takes care to call SslHandler.handshake() after the channel is connected
SMTPClientIdleHandler IdleStateAwareChannelUpstreamHandler implementation which will throw an SMTPIdleException if a connection was idle for to long time
SMTPClientPipelineFactory ChannelPipelineFactory which is used for the SMTP Client
SMTPConnectHandler SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler sub-class which acts as adapter for an SMTPResponseCallback.
SMTPPipeliningRequestEncoder OneToOneEncoder which takes care to encode SMTPPipeliningRequest's to ChannelBuffer's
SMTPRequestEncoder OneToOneEncoder which encoded SMTPRequest objects to ChannelBuffer
SMTPResponseDecoder OneToOneDecoder which decodes SMTPResponse's.
